description: Layer caramelised tortillas with sweet berries and creamy ricotta for a healthier weekend dessert option.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Aug 2021,Sesame free,Strawberry,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Berry & Ricotta Tortilla Stack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 1/4 cup ricotta. Combine remaining ricotta with honey, cinnamon and vanilla in a bowl.

Heat a medium non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Lightly brush both sides of 1 tortilla with a little ricotta mixture, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and caramelised. Repeat with remaining tortillas and a little ricotta mixture.
Layer tortillas with remaining ricotta mixture and three-quarters of the berries on a platter. Top stack with reserved ricotta and remaining berries, then serve.
